subject: Re: API Commercial Postcard
preview: That's awesome, thanks Ingrid. We will send over the invoice this afternoon, but if you need any further changes, shout out.

full_threads.body:
That's awesome, thanks Ingrid. 

We will send over the invoice this afternoon, but if you need any further changes, shout out.

The Team loves it!!! Thankyou.

Regards,

Ingrid Hobson

Administration & Sales Assistant



Freecall: 1800 630 535 D: 02 4708 9411 E: ingrid@apicommercial.com.au Sales Office: Level 6, 10 Herb Elliott Ave, Sydney Olympic Park, NSW, 2127 Delivery Address: 9 Pullman Place, Emu Plains, NSW, 2750 Post: PO Box 7079, Leura 2780



A division of the Almar Group

Licence No. 216380C

Click here to check out our latest projects!

https://www.rapidreliefteam.org/donate/

Thanks Heath, thats great!

Regards,

Ingrid Hobson

Administration & Sales Assistant



Freecall: 1800 630 535 D: 02 4708 9411 E: ingrid@apicommercial.com.au Sales Office: Level 6, 10 Herb Elliott Ave, Sydney Olympic Park, NSW, 2127 Delivery Address: 9 Pullman Place, Emu Plains, NSW, 2750 Post: PO Box 7079, Leura 2780



A division of the Almar Group

Licence No. 216380C

Click here to check out our latest projects!

https://www.rapidreliefteam.org/donate/

Hi Ingrid, 

Please see the revised version attached.

@heath here's the latest updates for api https://www.dropbox.com/sh/ir5ldi4o463yifb/AABRYd8Uty0WZlKWjpjW3WVZa?dl=0
please check and let me know if theres any changes

Thanks Heath,

Looks good....sorry just 2 more changes....
- would you be able to place the toilet pic in the middle and on the left put a pic of the aqua partitions with doors open. Just not liking the urinal picture.....
- and with the Education Fitout Specialist - can you please move this to a heading about the paragraph about API Commercial and 25 years etc and just make the catchy question bigger and in the middle

Sorry hope that all makes sense....thankyou.

Regards,

Ingrid Hobson

Administration & Sales Assistant



Freecall: 1800 630 535 D: 02 4708 9411 E: ingrid@apicommercial.com.aucom.au Sales Office: Level 6, 10 Herb Elliott Ave, Sydney Olympic Park, NSW, 2127 Delivery Address: 9 Pullman Place, Emu Plains, NSW, 2750 Post: PO Box 7079, Leura 2780



A division of the Almar Group

Licence No. 216380C

Click here to check out our latest projects!

https://www.rapidreliefteam.org/donate/

Hi Ingrid, 

Sure, confirming we have made those updates, please see attached.

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
@jaime - can you please tackle these updates for me?

Here is the InDesign Package: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/gpv9pjnztqti8wf/AACV19bycOdeecPL7hL8Rx5Ea?dl=0

Once done, export as PDF so we can resend to client please.

Thanks

Hello Heath,

Have had good feedback from the team :) Just a few touch-ups to make it not so much about washrooms
- API Commercial offers 25 years of experience to invest in the design, manufacture and installation of your fitout
- Change Education Washroom Fitout Specialists to 'Education Fitout Specialists'
- with the dot points - delete change rooms and medical facilities
- add learning areas and STEM/HIVE Facilities
- on the back page - change the handwash pic in middle of 2 pictures to either a urinal or boys toilet partition or the hand-wash basin inside the bathroom.
- Can we put a catchy statement to grab their interest - e.g Take advantage of specialists who have upgraded over 100 education spaces! (maybe this goes where the education washroom fit-out specialists is and pit the education fitout specialists elsewhere)

Sorry hope that makes sense....


Regards,

Ingrid Hobson

Administration & Sales Assistant

On Tue, Mar 24, 2020 at 8:30 PM Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>> wrote:
Hi Ingrid,

Please see the artwork attached.

I trimmed down a heap of the copy and ‘cut to the chaise’ as people will have a limited attention span with this and we are limited on space.

I have gone nice an bright so it will stand out too. I’m liking it, hope you do too!

Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU <https://wolfiq.com.au/>
E. heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au> | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

>

> Regards,

> On Mon, Mar 23, 2020 at 2:56 PM Dylan Smith <dylan@finelinensw.com.au <mailto:dylan@finelinensw.com.au>> wrote:
> Thanks Heath, yep no worries. With costs in mind, the only possible way to reduce pricing further would be to use a regular white envelope with black print or to reduce the size overall to A6 with a C6 Envelope.
>
> I have gone bottom rate on the printing aspects to alleviate some pricing and unfortunately I have no control with the postage costs. Let me know if you want to see another price option for the above suggestions.
>
>
>
> kind regards,
>
>
>

> Thanks Dylan,
>
>
>
> Yes, agree low cost is the go for now.
>
>
>
> Ingrid, are you ok for us to proceed based on the below pricing?
>
>
>

>

> On 23 Mar 2020, at 2:19 pm, Dylan Smith <dylan@finelinensw.com.au <mailto:dylan@finelinensw.com.au>> wrote:
>
>
>
> Hi Heath,
>
>
>
> Please find attached the quote for the API Flyers, Envelopes & Postage.
>
>
>
> I quoted for the Flyers on an A5 Satin Card and the Envelope on a Lime Green to match the API Colours (Image Below). The quote includes black overprint onto the envelopes for the addresses, postage paid stamp and logo – basically anything you want to put on there in black.
>
>
>
> There are some different things that we could do to the A5 Card if you want to add some embellishments but obviously depending what you want to do the cost is going to increase. Embellishments include textured stocks, metallic colours, lamination, spot uv, emboss / deboss, coloured foil (doing these quite cost effectively now).
>
>
>
> <image001.jpg>
>
>
>
> Let me know what you think.
>
>
>
> kind regards,
>
>
>
> Dylan Smith
>
> Unit 10, 9 Fitzpatrick Street
>
> Revesby NSW 2212
>
> Office Ph: 02 9519 0552
>
> Mobile: 0404 295 311
>

> <image003.jpg>
>
>
>
>
>
> From: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>
> Sent: 20 March, 2020 10:19 AM
> To: Ingrid <ingrid@apicommercial.com.au <mailto:ingrid@apicommercial.com.au>>; Dylan Smith <dylan@finelinensw.com.au <mailto:dylan@finelinensw.com.au>>
> Subject: API Commercial Postcard
>
>
>
> Hey Dylan,
>
>
>
> Hope you are well and staying safe.
>
>
>
> We are working on the artwork for Ingrid’s postcard. Now however we are wanting to move away from a postcard and do more of a double sided A5, that is then enveloped (gives us more space for the design).
>
>
>
> Can you please advise on the most cost effective way to achieve this. The double sided print will be around the A5 size, with an appropriately sized envelope that will need the addresses printed onto. I’m thinking something thicker or the actual artwork so it stands out more in a pile of mail.
>
>
>
> Please let me know so we can modify the artwork. And also send the updated pricing to Ingrid, apparently it’s 1000+ prints.
>
>
>
> Thanks!!
